name: WinVICEc154DiskImage
description: Create a disk image for your Commodore projects
author: Tony Landi

inputs.name: diskname
inputs.label: Disk name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a unique name for your media. The disk name allows for a maximum of 16 alpha-numeric characters and spaces are not permitted.

inputs.name: diskimagetype
inputs.label: Disk image type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of disk image to create. Default is d64 for the 1541 disk drive.

inputs.name: sourcefilelocation
inputs.label: Path to source file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the program file to add to your disk.

inputs.name: sourcefilename
inputs.label: Source File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filename to add to your disk image.
